title: Google Play Services high battery drain
content:
Anytime I am on mobile connection Google Play Services becomes my highest battery drain, but when on wifi all day it works fine. This has been occuring since December. These are the steps I have tried with no success:
Gone through google support and sent them bug reports,
Multiple factory resets,
Run with no 3rd party apps after a reset,
Used the Beta for Play Services,
Got a replacement phone from Verizon
There are a couple people on reddit that have the same problem, but no solutions
Most days I get less than 12 hours of use if
